Creates instatnce of class View.

Parameters:
queue - BlockingQueue for View to send messages to controller.
playerChoice - Determines which player use this view (FIRST == SERVER, SECOND == CLIENT)
Returns:

InformAndCloseFrame

message - Message which caused that the client view should be closed.
title - Title of child frame.
